SELECT n.* FROM ( SELECT no, title, content, date, count, file, id, name, member_no, LAG(no) OVER(ORDER BY no) AS preNum, LAG(title) OVER(ORDER BY title) AS preTitle, LEAD(no) OVER(ORDER BY no) AS nextNum, LEAD(title) OVER(ORDER BY title) AS nextTitle FROM notice_view) n WHERE n.no = #{no}
